modName: Targaryen Nightingale  Prime Armor - Game of Thrones
summary: A replacement for the Nightingale armor set themed around the Targaryens from A Song of Ice & Fire. This new version uses Satyr Zerofrost\'s high-resolution black Nightingale Armor as a base.
descriptionHtml:
This will replace your nightingale armor/boots/gloves with something a bit more dragon flavored.

The cape has the three-headed dragon of House Targaryen while the gloves are a dark crimson with runes of Valyrian Steel.

This new 4.0 pack includes my Targaryen Armor texture for men AND women (Gloves/Boots/Armor) but also a werewolf skin that matches the Targaryen features we all know (Purple Eyes/Silver Hair). 

Credits for the eyes/werewolf skin go to

CRO White Wolf - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=586
Diana - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1104

Credit for the high-resolution black nightingale armor I used as a base goes to Satyr Zerofrost

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896
author: AegonIV

files.name: Targaryen Female Nightingale Armor v2
files.changelogHtml: Removed the crest on the front. In very specific lighting conditions you can see part of one wing reflected but honestly -- I\'m befuddled as to why. It\'s model related I bet, we\'ll have to wait for the toolkit to fix that.
